about_the_game:
Intro

As a macro regional planning games at the scale of metropolitan and urban agglomerations,  players can freely plan and create urban areas in the huge regional space, develop the main city and satellite cities, expand the population, and determine the spatial form of the region, earn taxes by transporting commuters and facilitate population mobility. We have selected 15 well-known urban agglomerations or metropolitan areas around the world and divided them into various categories for creating.

Features

  • Covering levels of dozens of city maps in five types, with a long game time.

  • Familiar metropolitan circles and urban agglomerations, maybe there are cities where you live.

  • Regional maps based on real city textures and satellite images; multiple types of transportation and minimalist art design.

  • The data layer displays core metrics such as traffic flow, traffic density, population, road mileage, railway mileage, etc.

  • A tense and relaxing level mode, a more challenging hard mode and an infinite mode that provides players with ample funds.

Five region types

  • Bay cities

  • Seaside cities

  • Inland cities

  • Capital cities

  • Desert cities

Notice: now only 3 maps finished- Greater London metropolitian, Beijing (Capital-Tianjin Region), Shanghai (Soochow-Hu-Jia urban agglomeration)

Later Improvement

  • Optimizing the player interavtive experience and simulate a more realistic transportation system and taxation mechanism.

  • Further clarify the playing objectives and reward mechanisms, enhancing playability and entertainment degree.

  • The city map will continue to increase and improve.

  • Exploring the player's free drawing mode

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA Geforce GTX-650 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.8Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA Geforce GTX-1050Ti 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: MiniTrans is a city building and traffic simulation game. Players independently build main cities and satellite cities, develop metropolitan areas and city clusters, and build various transportation facilities between urban areas to transport commuters to earn taxes.
